name: buildpacks
desc: manage the buildpack for an app

params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: git remote of app to run command against

subcommands.name: buildpacks:add BUILDPACK_URL
subcommands.desc: add new app buildpack, inserting into list of buildpacks if neccessary

subcommands.name: buildpacks:clear
subcommands.desc: clear all buildpacks set on the app

subcommands.name: buildpacks:remove [BUILDPACK_URL]
subcommands.desc: remove a buildpack set on the app

subcommands.name: buildpacks:set BUILDPACK_URL
subcommands.desc: set new app buildpack, overwriting into list of buildpacks if neccessary
